replaced elemets.back: replaced elemets are those where the element's content that is replaced by something that is not directly represented in the document content img and input elements are replaced elements example:

nonreplaced elements.back: nonreplaced elements are the majority of HTML elements. There content is presented by the user agent inside a box genreated by the element itself example: nonreplaced

display roles.back:
block-level elements - generate an element box that fills its parent element's content area and cannot have other elements at its sides
inline-level elements - generate an element box within a line of text and do not break up the fow of that line

link tag.back:
<link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='css/html.css' media='all' />

common media attributes:
print
projection
screen
all

css comments.back:
/* comment here - mutli-line is ok too */

note: no other comments allowed
